markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 3" pfs="Standard">
[Unfolding Wind Rush](/Spells.aspx?ID=545)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 83 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You travel on a rushing wind. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order). You can Stride or Step into the air during this movement, moving upward at a 45-degree angle at most; if you end your movement in the air, you fall after taking one action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first. A [_wall of wind_](/Spells.aspx?ID=367) appears in all the spaces you left during this movement, lasting for 1 round.

---
**Heightened (5th)** The _wall of wind_ lasts 3 rounds.
name: Unfolding Wind Rush

<summary>
Run across the wind.
</summary>
text: Unfolding Wind Rush Single Action Source World Guide pg. 83 2.0 Cast verbal --- You travel on a rushing wind. Move two times: two Strides, two Steps, or one Stride and one Step (in either order). You can Stride or Step into the air during this movement, moving upward at a 45-degree angle at most; if you end your movement in the air, you fall after taking one action or when your turn ends, whichever comes first. A wall of wind appears in all the spaces you left during this movement, lasting for 1 round. --- Heightened (5th) The wall of wind lasts 3 rounds.
